description: Monitor executed commands and arguments that may acquire user credentials from third-party password managers. (Citation: ise Password Manager February 2019) Analytic 1 - Commands indicating credential searches in password managers. index=security sourcetype IN ("linux_secure", "macos_secure") (CommandLine IN ("*keepass*", "*lastpass*", "*1password*", "*bitwarden*", "*dashlane*", "*passwordsafe*", "*login*", "*vault*"))

external_references.description: ise. (2019, February 19). Password Managers: Under the Hood of Secrets Management. Retrieved January 22, 2021.
